channel.title: KitMaker Network RSS Feed
channel.description: This is the official RSS Feed for KitMaker Network.

item.title: Armorama : ModellTrans: September Releases
item.description: New items from Modelltrans Modellbau.

item.title: Armorama : Master Box: The American West
item.description: Work-in-progress at Master Box are three figure kits to be released under its Historical / American Civil War series.

item.title: AeroScale : IBG: Kobuz Sprue Shots
item.description: IBG Models has released images of the sprues for the forthcoming release of the 1/72 scale PZL P.11g Kobuz

item.title: AeroScale : AvantGarde: F-104G Starfighter Planned
item.description: Avante Garde Model Kits [AMK] has announced that it is working on a 1/48 scale F-104G Starfighter

item.title: AeroScale : Modelsvit: P-51H Sprue Shots
item.description: Modelsvit has posted images of the first sprue shots of their 1/48 scale P-51H Mustang

item.title: Armorama : Pen & Sword: Girl with a Sniper Rifle
item.description: Fay Baker takes a look at a book from Pen and Sword titled 'Girl with a Sniper Rifle - An Eastern Front Memoir'.

item.title: AeroScale : Pen & Sword: Aero-Neurosis Pilots WW1
item.description: Fay Baker takes a look at a new Pen and Sword offering covering Aero-Neurosis Pilots of the First World War and the Psychological Legacies of Combat.

item.title: Armorama : Das Werk: Zimmerit set for Panther
item.description: Dave Shick takes a look at a resin set released by Das Werk for adding zimmerit to a Panther A in 1/35th scale.

item.title: Armorama : Legend: M134D w/ SAG Shield
item.description: Pete Becerra reviews and builds the M134D Minigun on SAG Shield Mount w/4000rd Ammo Box from Legend productions in 1/35th scale.

item.title: Armorama : Legend: M134D Minigun
item.description: Pete Becerra reviews and builds a legend Productions offering of the M134D Minigun Basic Set #2 with 3000 round Ammo Box in 1/35th scale.

item.title: Armorama : Legend: M134D Minigun
item.description: Pete Becerra takes a look at and builds the M134D Minigun Basic Set #1 with 4000 round Ammo Box in 1/35th scale from Legend Productions.

item.title: Armorama : Gecko Cruiser Mk.I A9
item.description: John Lindbom shares some pictures of his Gecko Models Cruiser Mk.I A9.

item.title: Armorama : BoldDivision: Minenräumer
item.description: Soon to roll off from BoldDivision is a conversion set to build the WWII German mine clearing vehicle based on the Pz.Kpfw. III chassis.

item.title: Armorama : Das Werk: Sonderanhänger 115
item.description: The German 10-ton trailer is now available as a separate kit.

item.title: AeroScale : Exito: The Last in Line
item.description: A new set of decals covers some of the last of the Bf 109's built, including a post war Yugoslavian aircraft.

item.title: Armorama : AK: Wooden
item.description: New book with different techniques to represent wood on models.

item.title: Historicus Forma : Mitches: Last stand of the Old Guard Waterloo
item.description: MMM announced new kit:

item.title: Armorama : W-Model: 5N62 Radar and Amur Transporter
item.description: W-Model announces two new kits for the end of the year, a 5N62 Radar and an Amur Transporter

item.title: Armorama : Miniarm: T-34 Improvements
item.description: Miniarm informs about their new T-34 sets, plus a T-80UE-1 conversion.

item.title: Armorama : DDB: Sherman Tank Vol. 2
item.description: The second volume of David Doyle's Sherman tank is now available, dealing with the M4 and M4 (105) Medium Tanks.

item.title: Armorama : ICM: Gasoline Truck and Taxi
item.description: Take a break from armor and military subjects with these upcoming kits from ICM Holding.

item.title: AeroScale : MikroMir: Armstrong Whitworth Flying Wing Planned
item.description: MikroMir is drawing up plans to create a Armstrong Whitworth AW-52 research aircraft in 1/72 scale

item.title: AeroScale : Tamiya: P-38 October Release
item.description: Tamiya’s much anticipated new toll 1/48 scale Lockheed P-38 F/G Lightning will go on general release on the 20th of October.

item.title: AeroScale : Clearprop: Sonia Kit Contents
item.description: Clearprop Models has posted images of the box contents of the 1/72 scale КI-51 Sonia that will be on sale from this weekend

item.title: AeroScale : MikroMir: Flying Crane Planned
item.description: MikroMir are planning to release a 1/48 scale McDonnell Model 120 Flying Crane 1/48

item.title: Armorama : MiniArt: TACAM T-60
item.description: Darren Baker takes a look at the TACAM T-60 Romanian Tank Destroyer from MiniArt in 1/35th scale.

item.title: AeroScale : WWP: Dinah In Detail
item.description: Here's a look at WWP's photo study of the Ki-46III at RAF Cosford. First published in 2007, this is still the most comprehensive modeller's reference I've found on the Dinah.

item.title: AeroScale : DN Models: The Little Gramper
item.description: DN Models have released another colourful assembly ship mask set for Hobby Bosses 1/32nd B-24D Liberator.

item.title: Armorama : Panzer Art: September news from PanzerArt!
item.description: New batch of resin items is waiting for you.

item.title: Armorama : ICM: War Office Truck 8
item.description: Next up from ICM Holding is a softskin, the WOT 8 truck used by British Army as well as the Red Army.

item.title: Armorama : MiniArt: WWII Allied Road Signs
item.description: Work-in-progress at MiniArt is another road sign accessory set, this time focused on items employed by the Allies in the ETO.

item.title: AeroScale : Legend: AH-1Z Blade Fold Set
item.description: Pete Becerra takes a look at the AH-1Z Blade Fold Set from Legend Productions in 1/35th scale.

item.title: Historicus Forma : CGS Military Figures: Blues and Royals present day
item.description: CGS announced new kit:

item.title: Armorama : Legend: M134D Minigun
item.description: Pete Becerra takes a look at and uses the M134D Minigun Body Set from Legend Productions in 1/35th scale.

item.title: AeroScale : Airfix: B-25 Mitchell Mk.II
item.description: AIRFIX has tooled and released a new NORTH AMERICAN B-25 MITCHELL MK.II in 1/72. Join Fred Boucher in a walkaround.

item.title: AeroScale : ICM: Strike Foxbat Planned
item.description: ICM Holding is planning to release a 1/48 scale MiG-25BM a radar suppression version of this classic Cold War Warrior

item.title: AeroScale : ICM: Invader released
item.description: ICM Holding has released the quarter scale B-26B-50 Invader with marking to represent its service during the Korean War

item.title: AeroScale : Fly: Fiat G-50 Marking Options
item.description: Fly Models has released images of the marking options for their forthcoming release of the Fiat G-50 bis/AS in 1/72 scale

item.title: AeroScale : NH Detail: BV-155 Detail Set
item.description: NH Detail has released a photo etched detail set for Special Hobby’s 1/72 scale Blohm and Voss BV-155 (SH72372, SH72340)

item.title: AeroScale : Blackbird: OP-2E Neptune Conversion
item.description: Blackbird Models is close to releasing a 1/72 scale resin conversion set for the Lockheed OP-2E Neptune

item.title: AeroScale : Airfix: Buccaneer Released
item.description: Airfix has announced the release of the much anticipated 1/72 scale Blackburn Buccaneer S Mk.2 RN

item.title: AeroScale : Eduard: Fokker D.VII MAG Contents
item.description: Eduard has revealed the box contents of the 1/72 scale Limited Edition Fokker D.VII MAG

item.title: AeroScale : Exito: Sweet Fourteen Spritfires
item.description: Another great looking set of decals are now available for the Supermarine Spitfire FR XIV.

item.title: AeroScale : Special Hobby: Re.2000/2005 Update
item.description: Special hobby has released images of some of the parts for their new Reggiane Re.2000 and Re.2005 in 1/48 scale

item.title: AeroScale : Clearprop: Seasprite Planned
item.description: Clearprop Models has revealed plans to produce a plastic injected 1/72 scale UH-2 A/B Seasprite

item.title: Armorama : RyeField: M-ATV Ready for Shipping
item.description: Rye Field Models announced their M-ATV kit is ready to hit the shelves. Check out the images of the test model!

item.title: Historicus Forma : Master Box: Lady in Red
item.description: Master Box is about to release new figurine:

item.title: Historicus Forma : Corsar Rex: Donald Trump
item.description: Corsar Rex announced new bust:

item.title: AeroScale : Osprey: F-105 vs MiG-17
item.description: USAF F-105 THUNDERCHIEF VS VPAF MIG-17 from OSPREY PUBLISHING is a new title in their series DUEL. It examines the amazing air-to-air history of two dissimilar fighters clashing over Vietnam.

item.title: AeroScale : Eduard: Fillet Less Mustang
item.description: This weekend Eduard is to release the second ProfiPACK 1/48 scale P-51D and it will be the first quarter scale kit focusing on the fillet less early production D-5

item.title: AeroScale : DXM Decals: Tomcat Decal Release
item.description: DXM Decals has revealed the marking options contained in next month decal release featuring the F-14 Tomcat in 1/48, 1/72 and 1/144 scales

item.title: Armorama : W-Model: Russian Radars are coming
item.description: W-Model is preparing two new Russian radars to be released next month.

item.title: AutoModeler : Revell-Monogram: '40 Ford Standard Coupe
item.description: Here's a look at the Revell-Monogram kit of Ford's final Coupe before the hiatus caused by WW2.

item.title: AeroScale : Arctic Decals: American Airlines Vultee V-1A
item.description: Arctic decals has released a set of decals for American Airlines Vultee V-1A in 1/72 scale

item.title: AeroScale : Pepelatz: Fw P.127 CAD’s
item.description: Pepelatz has posted CAD images of the 1/72 scale Focke-Wulf P.127 that they are looking to release in the future

item.title: Armorama : Leopard 2A4 NL
item.description: Jasper Breur shares some pictures of his Revell Leopard 2A4 NL.

item.title: RailRoad Modeling : Soviet Railway Wagon Teplushka
item.description: Darren Baker takes a look at the Soviet Railway Wagon Teplushka, a 1/35th scale offerings from MiniArt.

item.title: AeroScale : Special Hobby: Whirlwind Wing Mould
item.description: Special Hobby has posted images of the wing mould for the 1/32 scale Westland Whirlwind twin engine fighter

item.title: AeroScale : MikroMir: Extender Marking Options
item.description: MikroMir has released details of the marking options for their forthcoming release of the 1/144 scale McDonnell Douglas KC-10 Extender

item.title: Armorama : MiniArt: Soviet Railway Wagon
item.description: Darren Baker takes a look at the Soviet Railway Wagon Teplushka, a 1/35th scale offerings from MiniArt.

item.title: AeroScale : AFV Club: U-2C On The Horizon
item.description: AFV Club will be releasing a quarter scale U-2C Dragon Lady in both early and late versions

item.title: AeroScale : Osprey: Jet Prototypes of WWII
item.description: Osprey has published a new book in their series of X-Planes: Jet Prototypes of World War II by Tony Buttler

item.title: AeroScale : Barracuda: Sea Fury Engine & Spinner
item.description: New from Barracuda Studios comes an engine front and spinner correction set for Airfix's Hawker Sea Fury.

item.title: AeroScale : Roden: Arado Ar 68 Planned
item.description: Roden is to release a quarter scale Arado Ar 68E with four marking options

item.title: AutoModeler : Hobbitime: 1/24 Spyder conversion kit for Fujimi F
item.description: Hobbitime Resin conversion kit for converting the 1/24 Fujimi Ferrari 330 P4 Berlinetta into a 330 Spyder.

item.title: AeroScale : ICM: A-26 B/C Invader
item.description: Darren Baker takes a look at a new decal release from ICM in 1/48th for the A-26 B/C Invader.

item.title: AeroScale : Dora Wings: Lysander Test Build
item.description: Dora Wings has posted on Facebook images of the test build of the 1/72 scale Westland Lysander Mk.III

item.title: Armorama : Attack Kits: Phänomen Granit 25H
item.description: Attack announces a new version of their 1/72 car Phänomen Granit 25H.

item.title: ModelGeek : Morland Studios: Haley Starshine
item.description: HALEY STARSHINE is a 32mm resin and metal figure from MORLAND STUDIOS. She is part of their ORDER OF THE STICK series.

item.title: AeroScale : Arctic Decals: Northop Gamma Conversion
item.description: Arctic Decals has produced a small run of conversion sets for the Northrop Gamma 2G in 1/72 scale

item.title: AeroScale : Hasegawa: Emily Is Back
item.description: Hasegawa has re-released the Kawanishi H8K1 Type 2 Model 11 Emily with the markings of the two aircraft that took part in the Second Pearl Harbour Attack

item.title: Armorama : MiniArt: Soviet Tram X-Series
item.description: Darren Baker gets to take an advanced look at the future release of a Soviet Tram X-Series early type in 1/35th scale from MiniArt.

item.title: Armorama : Tankograd: MAN KAT I LKW
item.description: Darren Baker takes a look at another of the new titles from Tankograd Publishing coveringCold War Warrior - MAN KAT I LKW The 5-ton, 7-ton and 10-ton MAN-Kat I Trucks in Cold War Exercises with the German Bundeswehr

item.title: AeroScale : HK Models: New Tool B-17G
item.description: Hong Kong Models has announced that they will be releasing a quarter scale early version of the B-17G next month

item.title: Historicus Forma : Armor 35: Two New Bikiny girls
item.description: ARMOR35 announces two (2) new additions to their range of beach babes. They are available in three scales: 1/16, 1/24, and 1/35.

item.title: Armorama : Armor 35: Wheel Sets and War Woman
item.description: ARMOR 35 continues to create 1/35 WHEEL SETS for Soviet light and medium-duty softskins. Also, a new military themed fantasy girl has been sculpted.

item.title: Armorama : Tankograd: Feuertaufe Leopard 2
item.description: Darren Baker takes a look at another of the new titles from Tankograd Publishing covering the Leopard 2 MBT's Baptism on Fire on Army Exercises 1984-86.

item.title: Armorama : Tankograd: MILITÄRFAHRZEUG 4-2019
item.description: Darren Baker takes a look at the latest Militär Fahrzeug release from Tankograd Publishing.

item.title: Armorama : Voyager: PE for Armata, Schützenpanzer Puma, and
item.description: September releases from Voyager Model.

item.title: Armorama : WWP: MaxxPro MRAP in Detail
item.description: Now available from Wings & Wheels Publications is its updated edition on this mine resistant armored fighting vehicle used by military and police forces across the globe.

item.title: Armorama : Panzer Shop: OT-62 Variants
item.description: Available from Panzershop are four conversion sets that build various configurations of the OT-62 amphibious tracked armored personnel carrier.

item.title: Armorama : BRAVO-6: Life is Good
item.description: Latest release of BRAVO*6 is again a very useful figure for Vietnam War U.S. soldiers at rest scenes and basecamp dioramas.

item.title: Armorama : MiniArt: Fl 282 V-16 Kolibri
item.description: Miniart is working on a new variant of the Kolibri, the Fl 282 V-16

item.title: Armorama : AK: The Iran-Iraq War
item.description: The fourth volume of the Modern Conflicts Profile Guide series is intended to be a handy reference guide to the most interesting Iraqi and Iranian military vehicles and artillery pieces.

item.title: Armorama : Echelon: New Decal Sets
item.description: Echelon announces five new decal sets for Panther, Sheridan and more.

item.title: Armorama : Live Resin: Modern Russian Soldiers
item.description: Live Resin announced their new releases: a number of figures depicting modern Russian soldiers and combined sets of previously released HH-60G Pave Hawk helicopter crew.

item.title: Armorama : Matho : Warning Signs and Clock Faces
item.description: Two new items are set for release by Matho Models soon.

item.title: Armorama : Aber: Track Pins, Barrels, and More
item.description: September releases from Aber.

item.title: Armorama : Peko Publishing: StuG Photobook
item.description: Up for release this month is the latest from Peko Publishing's WW2 Photobook Series, featuring the German Sturmgeschütz III.

item.title: Armorama : Abteilung 502: Camouflage and Organization of the
item.description: Panzerwaffe Tarnfarben. Cmaouflage colours and Organization of the German Armoured Forces (1917-1945) is the new book from Abteilung 502

item.title: AeroScale : ModelMaker: Portuguese F-16’s
item.description: Model Maker is to release a set of decals in both 1/72 and 1/48 scales for Portuguese F-16’s

item.title: Armorama : WWP: Early M113 in Detail
item.description: Here is the review of Early M113 in Detail, a photo reference manual for modelers from Wings & Wheels Productions. The aim of this title was not to give a complete history of the M113 and its variants, but to provide images and information regarding the variants used during the Vietnam War by the US and Australian armies plus the first versions used by the IDF.....

item.title: AeroScale : Air-Graphics: Hornet Detail Sets
item.description: Air-Graphic is working on some 1/72 scale detail sets for the F/A-18 and CAF CF-18 Hornet

item.title: AeroScale : MiniArt: Kolibri LI 282 Kolibra V-16 Planned
item.description: MiniArt Models is working on a release of the of the V-16 version of the Ll 282 Kolibri in 1/35 scale

item.title: AeroScale : MikroMir: Nieman KhAI-3 Released
item.description: MikroMir has released the Nieman KhAI-3 in 1/72 scale

item.title: AeroScale : Plus Model: Jet Boarding Ladders
item.description: Here's a look at Plus Model's injection-moulded ladders for the F-106, F-22, F-101B and MiG-29.

item.title: Armorama : Bronco: Dong Feng-1
item.description: Bronco Models has announced an unusual and unexpected releases in the form of China’s first ballistic missile the Dong Feng-1. This offering from Bronco Models is a little unusual in that it is 1/72nd scale, but with that said let’s take a closer look.....

item.title: AutoModeler : Aoshima: Subaru TT2 Sambar Fire Engine'11
item.description: Aoshima are to re-release a rather cute and compact fire engine in 1/24th scale.

item.title: Armorama : Achilles Walkaround
item.description: Matt Flegal shares some great reference photos he took of the Achilles tank destroyer at the American Heritage Museum.

item.title: AeroScale : Fonthill: Per Ardua
item.description: Per Ardua is a new book written by Philip Keeble and David Gledhill and published by Fonthill Media describes the road to becoming operational on the frontline from a Cold War pilot and navigator’s own experiences
